Class InlineCssTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • org.fxmisc.richtext.GenericStyledArea<PS,java.lang.String,S>

              • org.fxmisc.richtext.InlineCssTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClipboardActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, EditActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, TwoDimensional, NavigationActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, StyleActions<PS,java.lang.String>, TextEditingArea<PS,java.lang.String,S>, UndoActions, ViewActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>

    public class InlineCssTextArea
extends StyledTextArea<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
    Text area that uses inline css to define style of text segments and paragraphs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InlineCssTextArea​()
      Creates a blank area
      InlineCssTextArea​(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a text area with initial text content.
      InlineCssTextArea​(EditableStyledDocument<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> document)
      Creates an area that can render and edit another area's EditableStyledDocument or a developer's custom implementation of EditableStyledDocument.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InlineCssTextArea

        public InlineCssTextArea​()
        Creates a blank area

      • InlineCssTextArea

        public InlineCssTextArea​(EditableStyledDocument<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> document)
        Creates an area that can render and edit another area's EditableStyledDocument or a developer's custom implementation of EditableStyledDocument.

      • InlineCssTextArea

        public InlineCssTextArea​(java.lang.String text)
        Creates a text area with initial text content. Initial caret position is set at the beginning of text content.
        Parameters:
        text - Initial text content.
